about_the_game:
Step into a battle between faith and darkness in this gripping visual novel.

As a local priest, you are summoned to a remote village to perform an exorcism on a young woman tormented by a powerful demon. Each decision you make unveils a piece of the mystery and brings you closer to discovering the demon’s true identity. Will your choices lead to salvation—or damnation?

Features:

  • Choice-Driven Gameplay: Every decision matters, shaping the narrative and leading to multiple endings.

  • Diverse Demon Encounters: Identify the possessing demon from a roster of cunning adversaries, each with unique personalities and tactics.

  • Moral Dilemmas: Navigate the tension between faith, doubt, and temptation in a story steeped in psychological horror.

  • Atmospheric Visuals and Sound: Immerse yourself in the eerie setting with hand-drawn artwork and a haunting soundtrack.

  • Replayability: Experience different outcomes based on your choices, encouraging multiple playthroughs to uncover every secret.

Are you ready to confront the darkness and test your faith? The fate of a soul—and your own—is in your hands.

content_descriptors.notes: This game explores mature themes, including demonic possession, religious conflict, and moral dilemmas. It features depictions of psychological distress, mild violence, and dark supernatural elements. Player discretion is advised.
